title: can we get a nerf on draven plz
body: Pretty obscure place to put this, but me and a 'few' other summoners are beginning to feel like Draven's well overpowered atm, can we get a nerf to fix this plz, its been a fair while and this has only become more prevalent, anyways cheers.

replies.body:
I agree.

Yea, he has counterplay, you can stop him from catching his axes.
The thing is, you're not alive long enough to put your counterplay into action. 

He takes maximum 3 axes to kill any non-tank champ, and he can throw 2 of them without needing to catch any. Which means if you let him catch just 1, you're dead!
nerf freaking akali legit q auto half hp

I'm with you on this one to be fair, Akali's fairly busted atm. I'm more disliking the fact you cant do anything about her shroud, and it's near on impossible to play around with certain champs. Either the duration is too long or we need some way to be able to counter this, as atm there's nothing.
My beef with her, is that her Q is on you 100% of the time, which means she zones melee champs to hell.

A deaths dance nerf will be enough to bring him out of meta because draven's counter is burst damage. Being a former draven main, draven excels highly at doing damage which makes him good for solo queue but not for competitive play. He's not really good at anything else though.
Its the fact that he can rush deaths dance and live for much longer than he should be able to.
